Reviews.Title: “Beautiful!”
Reviews.Author: Callum H
Reviews.Content: wife started honeymoon paris victoria palace almost perfect superior double room roomy great bathroom chocolates every evening next days weather forecast nice touch found hotel employees extremely helpful recommending tours directions helping us bookings mind hotel admittedly little way major sites however little annoying taxi driver heard street stay hotel must carry around hotel address taxi use excellent find way one taxi driver said 30 years paris hardly streets know one anyway would still recommend hotel since quite nice romantic also close number great streets shops probably miss stay one touristy neighborhoods

Reviews.Title: “Good clean hotel in good location”
Reviews.Author: LoveYourLibrary
Reviews.Content: travel agent hotel website bit superior double room larger price good minuses scrambled eggs breakfast gave bad next day room poor open windows brings noise turn system around 1 beware also found staff ok informed taking train gare du girl behind desk us hour ahead reasons security true could gotten 10 minutes ahead fine security wrong information hotel bit faded many ways outskirts 6th although problem us next visit paris id like try something else

Reviews.Title: “The receptionist in the daytimes was awfull....”
Reviews.Author: wade w
Reviews.Content: final leg honeymoon france victoria palace disappoint friendly helpful staff personally showed us room explained hotel surrounding area location walk seine latin quarter st easy pleasant dont forget visit jardin luxembourg nearby relaxing time beautiful park asked staff two occasions recommend good restaurant great dining experiences definitely

Reviews.Title: “Location Location, Clean and Easy for a short stay”
Reviews.Author: spiro_sc
Reviews.Content: victoria palace nice beautiful property extremely friendly attentive staff great location near 2 metro stops room clean comfortable complaint appears victoria hotel used frequently large groups crowds people lobby checking trying checking suitcases halls noise etc husband quite shock one guest apparently lovely breakfast room hotel breakfast kitchen appeared short slippers crowds nice hotel

Reviews.Title: “great hotel”
Reviews.Author: mihaela p
Reviews.Content: beautiful hotel plenty atmosphere excellent service beautifully appointed rooms would trouble recommending clients

Reviews.Title: “Terrible to say the least! Do not recommend.”
Reviews.Author: ASeyed
Reviews.Content: spent 3 nights junior suite room really good size bathroom staff extremely helpful old style hotel decorated high standard spotless u cons like flat screen tv mini bar excellent hairdryer etc thing didnt like hotel beds firm used sheets blankets rather near metro stops etc spent time st germain 1015 minute walk try le restaurant u find find near st germain metro stop paris beautiful city still managed enjoy despite raining whole time

Reviews.Title: “Romantic weekend in Rome”
Reviews.Author: RXJimbo
Reviews.Content: spent seven nights junior suite hotel quiet rooms extremely clean comfortable hotel quiet side street easy access metro stations buses louvre area within 15 minutes metro many days took metro one way made way back foot lots shopping shoes plus small supermarket corner used small minibar fridge store room cheeses course wine bathroom good sized marble shower water pressure great good lighting room service overpriced thats room service right approx 23 coffee croissants one person coffee people beware theres nowhere hotel get coffee without buying breakfast many places coffee nearby including starbucks negatives pretty minor bed made heat hard spent nights opening windows cool room another staff walked us three times either turndown service check mini bar never heard knock sure door assured privacy service sets hotel apart everyone gracious helpful every request handled beautifully would stay ps reviews mention eiffel tower view one rooms according hotel staff view room

Reviews.Title: “Would not recommend this hotel”
Reviews.Author: GlasgowShadow
Reviews.Content: husband stayed christmas eve 2006 stayed 3 nights total payed 300 large bed simply hotel worked 15 minutes get us taxi difficult 7pm time apparently hard get taxis 7 area everyone going dinner made reservations us nice resturant xmas eve everything perfect actually walked back form walked place lovely area stay fine taking metro etc heard people french rude everyone nice us people hotel spoke good english bathroom wall wall marble cute bed slippers room standard 2 balconies small nice view main street right across street kind like much better best buy anything need get nicest hotel ever stayed simply worth every penny staff fantastic

Reviews.Title: “Great location, huge room, great view”
Reviews.Author: JamesBanner
Reviews.Content: returned hotel four night stay new years reviews accurate since rely much trip advisor seems fair add pros rooms clean soundproof never heard neighbors one either side heard people us one morning kids running around shower good pressure bathroom good size staff nice front desk awesome dining suggestions try awesome always available help pleasant far friendly person met paris tell friends worth say hello breakfast fine average open outside hotel lot closed new years day particular probably would preferred eat nearby ambiance hotel quiet intimate suprised breakfast even see many people bc never felt busy loud crowded computer available lobby area check email etc convenient overall would definitely recommend hotel especially first cons really one us hotel quite centrally located would liked good area w shopping dining etc lot charm fact although would love stayed v say much preferred area champs area would inconvenient felt like mall location problem us preferred walk rather take metro buses could see everything vp little way big tourists attractions easy take metro buses though avoid issue kind fault also beds really hard bother us know many trip advisor reviews issue lot travelers generally fall category even january w rain paris beautiful eat walk streets see st architecture history city

Reviews.Title: “Do not stay here”
Reviews.Author: cindyellen
Reviews.Content: returned 3 day stay wonderfull hotel selected place read reviews tripadvisor disappointed atmosphere hotel staff room exactly looking room clean large well furnished staff friendly helpfull spending entire day busy paris like taking warm bath returning hotel end day hotel recommended restaurant saturday night really good organised small chocolate cake birthday delicious looking classy hotel stay victoria palace hotel

Reviews.Title: “good hotel near the crosslines of metro - train”
Reviews.Author: EriAntwerp
Reviews.Content: returned lovely 2 night stay victoria palace moment checked hotel staff friendly informative courteous front desk took us room show us around room access two balconies queen size bed large bathroom nicely decorated maintained breakfast terrific service seemed someone always around answer questions theres free internet connection computer telephone next front desk lobby nice bar inviting sitting area plenty chairs want rest tired feet walking around city streets short walk metro bus 10 minutes louvre bus plenty restaurants within walking distance would highly recommend victoria palace looking reasonably priced paris standards warm inviting stay left bank paris

Reviews.Title: “Great location, large rooms for Italy!”
Reviews.Author: SoxFans07
Reviews.Content: found hotel staff charming welcoming perfect hotel perfect trip

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel - Recommended”
Reviews.Author: bhusawal
Reviews.Content: returned 5 nights victoria palace would thoroughly recommend looking quiet smallish hotel 63 rooms city centre travelled montparnasse station easy walking distance hotel hidden away busy rue de opted junior suite large room beautifully decorated spacious bathroom right help long days walking many paris sites breakfast excellent long dont miss big fresh fruit excellent bread cheese etc really expected hoped paris evening restuarant although offer room service however endless eating choices nearby problem hotel tend suggest expensive restaurants worth experience nearby bars bistros offer excellent alternative third price one liked called le rue du 5 walk away building next door undergoing refurbishment present noise start 8am like long sleep might idea ask room away finished flew home airport 25 euro taxi ride hotel

Reviews.Title: “If location is matter for you- you found it here!”
Reviews.Author: ukitraveler
Reviews.Content: enjoyed 10 night stay victoria palace hotel september 2006 staff helpful junior suite large well appointed stay could much better short walk nearest metro

Reviews.Title: “great location, average hotel”
Reviews.Author: andowi
Reviews.Content: hotel find good deal booked vacation france italy air france holidays staff air france holidays incredibly knowledgable friendly amazing cant find customer service like anymore knew every little detail victoria palace restaurant recommendations information sightseeing sorts information paris france italy loved hotel quiet street neighborhood please favor stay victoria palace book holiday air france holidays

Reviews.Title: “I threw a coin in the fountain to return to Rome, and when I do I will stay at the same hotel - the Gallia”
Reviews.Author: barbara_stewart2
Reviews.Content: excellent loved stay hotel lovely decorated traditional staff friendly gave us cocktails arrival room immaculate lots lovely extras made perfect holiday breakfast ok small buffet done would recommend everyone one nicest hotels ever stayed

Reviews.Title: “Worst hotel ever!”
Reviews.Author: Lennart123
Reviews.Content: anyone describe hotel much beyond perfectly reasonable well run hotel average rooms genuinely like read previous reviews actually book hotel would amazed disappointed arrive booked deluxe suite 3 nights thought made mistake apparently one biggest rooms room really standard double size best bed large everything else let old quaint way carpet covered lots stains basic mini bar described well stocked clearly prices complete rip small box beer bathroom basic well perfectly sink bath panel marble luxury bathroom windows impossible open properly view courtyard needed 4 mirrors catch want convenient hotel average facilites fine want touch luxury etc wont find

Reviews.Title: “Very friendly staff, good location, air conditioner quite uneffective”
Reviews.Author: alexbottoni
Reviews.Content: stayed 4star hotel 4 nights early august celebrating 20th anniversary hotel located left bank quiet side street rue de rennes 5minute walk train station gare montparnasse metro subway system based price comparison 4star hotels right bank hotel incredible deal deluxe room nice size normal american room comfortable bed room bathroom clean room wallpaper clean carpet flat panel tv bathroom marble walls floor nice toiletries provided day room twice day late morning early evening including turndown service chocolates bed note anticipated weather next day front desk staff extremely helpful willing call selected restaurant make dinner reservation us call car rental company confirm car rental requested since french great front desk manager hotel manager extremely nice hotel lobby beautifully decorated looks exactly like photos website initially given room floor 3 lobby considered floor room 4 floors lobby saw elevator near front desk saw small compared american standards maybe would fit 3 people mentioned porter would rather walk stairs front desk manager immediately insisted take room 1st floor even took steps within 30 seconds room changed incredible service breakfast served clean dining room adjacent lobby quite spread cold items various cheeses various cold cuts various fruit yogurt various hot items scrambled eggs bacon sausage coffee great types food provided day shopping many small upscale stores within block rue de rennes completely loved hotel stay next time paris

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, In a great location.”
Reviews.Author: lolly8t8
Reviews.Content: hotel wonderful choice far latin quarter turned absolute favorite area paris hotel smaller elegant best part hotel kind classy management important foreign city come hotel long hard day sight seeing important feel coming home kind people watching also people trust assist stay wonderful hotel highly recommend

Reviews.Title: “Gallia 2 star at best”
Reviews.Author: alexander27
Reviews.Content: ok got back couple nights staying victoria palace hotel paris booked based tripadvisor status number 1 time hotel nice rooms well maintained expect sort price range looking inner courtyard paying price though location isnt best paris close metros montparnasse number lively cafes breakfasts varied long dont go cooked perhaps french dont cooked breakfasts well expect price also arranged limo station hotel never booked hotel wasnt informed bar shut 1am check youve got back night cap bad expect details money

Reviews.Title: “Great!”
Reviews.Author: IHS81
Reviews.Content: find victoria palace really lovely hotel

Reviews.Title: “Won't go back there”
Reviews.Author: Caesar07
Reviews.Content: husband returned june 2006 two week trip paris husband frequent travellers big cities past years always stayed four five star hotels new york london san francisco city review based experiences hotel victoria palace compared four star hotels major cities paris twice trip never stayed left bank side used hotel reviews posted tripadvisor make final decision victoria palace pleased got reviews quite accurate hotel staff attentive friendly speak good english dont speak french need help booking reservations restaurants shows etc rooms clean well maintained water pressure toilet shower good wont shower head water internet email like husband get internet connection wireless connection laptop set rooms equipped full bathroom hairdryer mirror bathroom television air conditioning minibar phone course amenities listed website found convenient liking example charge electric us cell phones laptop etc need american french outlet adaptor need buy bring one us since borrow one hotel dry cleaning laundry services course available attached bathroom wall handy us wash also security box room keep valuables imagine rooms equipped another great feature hotel location conveniently located metro stops st rennes prefer people watching walking walked everywhere including museum louvre department store museum hotel owner hotel also knows talking comes good food checkin give list restaurants nearby walking distance recommend first tried places looked soon gave trying hotels recommendations far superior accurate think tried six restaurants recommended absolutely wonderful reasonably priced anything negative say hotel would probably breakfast bed didnt think breakfast anything special though wasnt bad either dont use beds would really nice plus instead use thin hotel blankets hard cotton sheets comfortable especially youve gotten used hotels like westin heavenly beds good covered high thread count cotton sheets nevertheless really enjoyed stay victoria palace would definitely go back future

Reviews.Title: “A Curates Egg”
Reviews.Author: exeman
Reviews.Content: must admit read rave reviews hotel bit unsure hotel owner 40 friends genuine well good one top top hotel everything previous reviewers say true minute walk hotel made welcome receptionist time took us room budget travellers arrived like spend bit extra hotel hotel worth every penny truly excellent value room perfect dont one bad thing say bathroom luxurious room clean 2 nights great sleep staff genuinely nice never nice know mean breakfast lovely treated well slippers robes suite rooms cold minibar cool tv strong shower nice toiletries small things add make great hotel many bigger hotels even 5 star hotels get wrong great views typical parisian rue great area shopping le wife living dream well done mr owner sorry cant remember name great hotel please dont let change back one thing would say nearest metro stop isnt st although cant remember called think p even closer rarely give service 1010 shop restaurant company etc hotel 1010 problem hotel problem life enjoy

Reviews.Title: “Faulty Towers”
Reviews.Author: scrumpyjack64
Reviews.Content: wife went met friendly staff treated us owners hotel reception checkin process quick thought everything made ready prior arrival rooms decorated nicely give impression king definitely go

Reviews.Title: “I'd definately go back”
Reviews.Author: Yomster
Reviews.Content: spent thanksgiving paris almost cancelled car arrived victoria palace hotel glad went beautiful hotel quiet street montparnasse one block rue de rennes two blocks boulevard montparnasse far luxembourg gardens near wonderful restaurants great shopping walked everywhere latin quarter dorsay even though cold nice end day return gorgeous comfortable room hotel sit fire lounge nice drink changing dinner staff amazing friendly kind knowledgeable restaurant recommendations right first day completely gave guide book dining hotel quiet lovely oasis chaotic paris never stay anywhere else

Reviews.Title: “Really nice, but don't expect the Ritz”
Reviews.Author: jennifer410
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights junior suite lovely view eiffel tower room breakfast good staff friendly helpful location quite good 20 minutes seine plenty restaurants close room bit pricy hotels generally cheap paris anyway shower bit flat much power apart lovely give 5 stars think lacked something couldnt put wow fantastic wasnt saying nothing could

Reviews.Title: “Could have been better”
Reviews.Author: Dungiven
Reviews.Content: reviews right wonderful place stay close metro quiet everyone helpful would definitely stay room junior suite beautiful bathroom lovely everything spotless always pleasure return hotel long day sightseeing

Reviews.Title: “nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: family stayed victoria palace six nights extremely pleased service well decorated kept rooms staff pleasant always willing go extra mile providing service staff excellent definitely great place stay vacation make great cup hot chocolate also hotel within 15 minute walk luxembourg gardens beautiful many great restaurants shopping mall close metro would definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “A Fine Stay, Good Location...”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: husband spent anniversary paris victoria palace hotel absolutely fantastic upgraded us junior suite enormous european standards impressed wonderful helpful staff lovely breakfast however really impressive little extras like weather forecast every night umbrellas case rain attentive staff

Reviews.Title: “Middle of the road”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: husband stayed trip paris couldnt better staff helpful fluent english rooms spacious bathrooms done mostly marble dont expect great view needs steps away bustling streets even though hotel quiet one return lovely hotel

Reviews.Title: “"Good location, Good value for the money"”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: experience hotel brilliant requested room kind friendly helpful staff granted wish room huge id assume one biggest hotel ive seen people size rooms view room basilica maria amazing added bonus terrace breathtaking sunset breakfast standard nice location perfect especially coliseum

Reviews.Title: “OK hotel, a safe bet”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: rome like london tricky hotels town centre ones cramped old modern spacious ones city hotel walk water problems spacious room corner rooms probably largest light buffet breakfast thats standard italy fine nearby great pubs corners st maria case want find english speakers watch im sure ive stayed dozen rome hotels would definitely recommend one
